tagline.title: Bali North West Tour Is One Day Tour For Visiting Popular Tourist Destination In Northern and Western Area Bali Islands
tagline.text: BALI NORTH WEST TOUR IS ONE DAY TOUR FOR VISITING POPULAR TOURIST DESTINATION IN NORTHERN AND WESTERN AREA BALI ISLANDS
tagline.html: Bali North West Tour Is One Day Tour For Visiting Popular Tourist Destination In Northern and Western Area Bali Islands

description.text: Bali North West Tour is an Bali Full Day Tour Packages to enjoy tour within one day to visit tourist destinations that are very popular in the northern and western regions of the island of Bali, a tour that is in great demand by tourists because it contains visiting tourist destinations that are very favorite and very instagramable when photographed, is an option. from several tourist destinations that are very instagramable once made into a one-day package in this Bali North West Tour. The first adventure will be visiting the Banyumala Twin Waterfall tourist destination with the uniqueness of its twin waterfalls and the very clear water and cool air make this tourist destination very beautiful. Proceed to Wanagiri Hidden Hill to see the beautiful view of Tamblingan and Buyan lakes which are also often called twin lakes, here are also many places for photo spots with a very instagramable background of Tamblingan lake. Proceed to handara gate to see a very beautiful view of the gate with Balinese carving designs that look very stunning and this gate is also called the Gate of Serenity. Proceed to the restaurant to enjoy lunch with very delicious Indonesian food, after lunch the journey continues to Ulun Danu Beratan Temple to see the beauty of the temple located on the lake which is functioned to worship the goddess of the lake which is located in this Beratan lake, a very instagramable view with a temple and lake in the background. After that we will go to the hotel where you are staying with a very impressive experience on a one day tour to the Northern and Western Bali Islands in the Bali North West Tour program, accompanied by an experienced tour driver and a comfortable car will make Bali North West Tour has become so much fun and full of amazing experience

image.title: Banyumala Twin Waterfall | Bali North West Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Banyumala Twin Waterfall is one of the tourist destinations in northern Bali islands that offer a very beautiful waterfall with the uniqueness of the twin waterfall which makes the scenery very enchantingly beautiful, besides that under the waterfall there is a pool of water that is not so deep with a clear waterfall making this pool of water a suitable place for bathing. Besides that the scenery around the waterfall is still natural with many green trees making the scenery here very instagramable so it is suitable as a photo spot in this Bali North West Tour. It is a very impressive experience to see the beauty of the banyumala twin waterfalls which is so enchanting on the north west tour which is very popular among nature lovers especially waterfalls and the expanse of lush and green forest turns out to save its own beauty.

It is a very impressive experience to see the beauty of the banyumala twin waterfalls which is so enchanting on the north west tour which is very popular among nature lovers especially waterfalls and the expanse of lush and green forest turns out to save its own beauty.

image.title: Bali North West Tour | Wanagiri Hidden Hill | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Wanagiri Hidden Hill is one of the most popular tourist destinations on the northern side of Bali with views of twin lakes (buyan and tamblingan lake) which are so enchanting once seen from this hidden hill wanagiri. Here, in addition to the view of Tamblingan Lake, there are also many photo spots that are very interesting and very instagramable, with the background of Tamblingan Lake being so enchanting, green hills near the lake and green trees around the lake adding to the impression of beauty that you will get in Bali North West Tour. An experience that is very extraordinary memorable by capturing yourself through photos in photo spots in wanagiri hidden hill with a background of very enchanting natural scenery that will make your day very colorful and will complete your holiday in Bali

image.title: Bali North West Tour | Handara Gate | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Handara Gate is one of the very popular tourist destinations where you will take pictures at the gate with a Balinese carving design and a green hill background that will make the photos very instagramable, Handara gate is also called the Gate of Serenity which if seen is the impression of the gate This really gives serenity, comfort and beauty, a very complete impression. Handara gate is one of the most iconic photo spots. very strategically located on the main road leading to the northern area of the island of Bali and also very often visited by photo tourism lovers because the photos produced are very iconic, enjoy this very pleasant experience on the Bali North West Tour which is very popular for see the beauty of a very iconic tourist destination that located in the northern and western areas of the island of Bali

image.title: Bali North West Tour | Ulun Danu Beratan Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Ulun Danu Beratan Temple is one of the oldest temples on the island of Bali with all its uniqueness that makes this Ulun Danu Beratan temple very popular among tourists. This Ulun Danu Beratan Temple was built in the 17th century to worship the Tri Murti, namely Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva and also the Ulun Danu Beratan Temple is dedicated to the goddess of the lake in Lake Beratan, Dewi Danu. The uniqueness of the Ulun Danu Beratan Temple can be seen from the location of the Meru Solas Temple which is located on the lake, when the lake water is large it will look like this temple is floating on a lake. A very beautiful and instagramable sight if it is captured in a photo and an unforgettable experience on a one day Bali North West Tour that will complete your tourist adventure on the island of Bali

price.title: Bali North West Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali North West Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour (no sharing), We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Bali North West Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 650,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 950,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,250,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 750,000/person
Note : Minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

content.event: Visit Banyumala Twin Waterfall
Visit Wanagiri Hidden Hill
Visit Ulun Danu Beratan Temple

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
